Captain.Title: William T. Riker
Captain.Ability: When attacking a ship with a larger Hull value than your ship, you gain +1 attack die. When defending against a ship with a larger Hull value than your ship, you roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Surat
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Place a [SCAN] Token beside your ship. If you do not have a [TECH] Upgrade deployed to your ship, place the Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship as well.
